T02D2683:223b-0: spyan drangs nas sngags dang phyag rnams kyis dbang @223b
T02D2683:223b-2: de'i 'og tu bdog pa nyams pa spel ba'i thabs ston te /
T02D2683:223b-4: phun sum tshogs med gang chags dang //
T02D2683:223b-6: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams bde ba dang bral te /
T02D2683:223b-7: nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal bkres grang la sogs pa
T02D2683:223b-8: gnod pa'i bye brag rnams kyis bde ba mi 'chags
T02D2683:223b-9: te / sdug bsngal chags pa de sbyang ba'i thabs
T02D2683:223b-10: ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs te rgyas
T02D2683:223b-12: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:223b-13: de'i 'og tu nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyis 'jig rten pa'i lha mi dga' ba ston te ;
T02D2683:223b-15: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /
T02D2683:223b-17: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam tshig mnos pa las /
T02D2683:223b-18: gzhung dang ma mthun pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lha 'phags pa rnams ma mnyes pa dang /
T02D2683:223b-19: kun rdzob kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs pas lha rnams 'phongs pa dang /
T02D2683:223b-20: de la sogs te lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i tha tshig ni /
T02D2683:223b-21: bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te /
T02D2683:223b-23: mchod rdzas la sogs pa 'od dang /
T02D2683:223b-24: kha dog dmar por bsgyur te /
T02D2683:223b-25: chags pa'i tshul gyis dbang gi las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:223b-26: de'i 'og tu lha mi dga' ba'i snga ltas ston te /
T02D2683:223b-28: mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang //
T02D2683:223b-30: lha phongs ba'i snga ltas bdag la mdza' bo dang /
T02D2683:223b-31: 'khor la sogs pa rnams bsams pa dang mi mthun
T02D2683:223b-32: pa'i phyogs zhe sdang dang ngan sems la sogs pa'i
T02D2683:223b-33: byad stems rnams drag po'i las byas na 'grub par
T02D2683:223b-34: gsungs / de'i 'og tu 'khor la gnod pa ste /
T02D2683:223b-36: bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang /
T02D2683:223b-38: rgyal po stobs ldan snying po dang /
T02D2683:223b-39: khams gsum gyi sems can g-yog bran dang /
T02D2683:223b-40: bza' mi la sogs pa la gnod sbyin dang bdud
T02D2683:223b-41: la sogs pas gtses pa'i rgyus rang re'i mi mthun
T02D2683:223b-42: pa la las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:223b-43: de'i 'og tu mi mthun pa ston te /
T02D2683:223b-45: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin pa dang //
T02D2683:223b-47: gdon 'byung pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus /
T02D2683:224a-0: sems can rnams la phan tshun mi mthun @224a * //
T02D2683:224a-2: dgra bo lta bur sems pa zhi ba'i las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:224a-3: de'i 'og tu bdog pa nyams pa ston te /
T02D2683:224a-5: nor 'grib sa pas ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2683:224a-7: bdag gi bdog pa phun sum tshogs pa nyams nas phongs pa ste /
T02D2683:224a-8: gzhan la rag lus nas bdag nyon mongs pa la /
T02D2683:224a-9: rgyas pa'i las byas na bdog pa yong par gsungs /
T02D2683:224a-10: de'i 'og tu mya ngan gyi gnod pa ston te /
T02D2683:224a-12: mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang //
T02D2683:224a-14: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams sems kyi mya ngan
T02D2683:224a-15: sna tshogs dang ldan pas lus rab tu ngal te
T02D2683:224a-16: / sdug bsngal rnams kyis rab tu gzir ba la
T02D2683:224a-17: mya ngan gyi cho 'phrul la sogs pa zhi ba'i
T02D2683:224a-19: de'i 'og tu 'jigs shing phongs pa ston te /
T02D2683:224a-21: 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang //
T02D2683:224a-23: sems can rnams rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2683:224a-25: rkun pos 'jigs pa dang me dang chus 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2683:224a-28: skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang brgyad do //
T02D2683:224a-29: gzhan yang mgon skyabs med cing phongs pa'i bye brag
T02D2683:224a-30: rnams phrin las rnam bzhi'i las byas na 'grub par
T02D2683:224a-31: gsungs / de'i 'og tu byad stems bshad de /
T02D2683:224a-33: gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang //
T02D2683:224a-35: 'jig rten gyi khams su gza' chen po brgyad dang /
T02D2683:224a-36: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa so
T02D2683:224a-37: so'i byad stems kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
T02D2683:224a-38: rnams la mi nad dang phyugs nad dang /
T02D2683:224a-39: chom rkun dang mdangs 'phrog pa la sogs pa gnod pa'i bye brag rnams la /
T02D2683:224a-40: phrin las rnam bzhi'i las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:224a-41: de'i 'og tu gdon gyis nyen pa ston te /
T02D2683:224a-43: mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang //
T02D2683:224a-45: 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la phung po dang khams ma snyoms pa dang /
T02D2683:224a-46: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa'i gdon dang /
T02D2683:224a-47: gzhan yang bi n'a ya ka la sogs pa'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis nyen pa la /
T02D2683:224a-48: phrin las rnam bzhi'i las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:224b-0: de'i 'og tu mya @224b dan ngal las byung ba'i rmi lam ston te /
T02D2683:224b-2: mya ngan ngal las byung ba yis //
T02D2683:224b-3: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
T02D2683:224b-5: nyon mongs pa'i sems can phyin ci log gi lta
T02D2683:224b-6: ba'i bag chags kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pa langs
T02D2683:224b-7: pa'i rgyus lus dang sems ngal zhir thang chad pas
T02D2683:224b-8: blo gtibs pas / gnyid log pa'i rmi lam la
T02D2683:224b-9: ltas ngan gyi rmi lam sdig pa'i bag chags las
T02D2683:224b-10: byung ba dmyal bas bsregs pa la sogs pa'i rmi
T02D2683:224b-11: lam sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis pa rnams phrin las
T02D2683:224b-12: rnam bzhi'i las byas na 'grub par gsungs /
T02D2683:224b-13: de'i 'og tu cho ga'i thabs ston te /
T02D2683:224b-15: des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2683:224b-16: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya //
T02D2683:224b-18: slob dpon slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2683:224b-19: lha dang mi lta gon la gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2683:224b-20: rdzas dang yo byad la sogs pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2683:224b-21: de'i 'og tu slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi chog rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2683:224b-22: bdud rtsi'i bum pas slob ma la sogs pa'i spyi
T02D2683:224b-23: po nas dbang bskur zhing khrus bya ba ni phyi
T02D2683:224b-24: nang gi dri ma bkru ba'o //
T02D2683:224b-25: de ltar bdud rtsi'i bum pas nyon mongs pa rnams gtsang bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2683:224b-26: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2683:224b-27: mdo sde'i don bshad cing nyan du bcug la /
T02D2683:224b-28: bsgom pa'i lung dpong cig lha'i ngo bo bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:224b-29: de'i 'og tu phyi nang gi chos bstan te /
T02D2683:224b-30: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2683:224b-31: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2683:224b-32: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2683:224b-34: slob ma gzhi dad pa dang ldan zhing ;
T02D2683:224b-35: yid dge bal sems dang zhing spyod pa tshang ba dang /
T02D2683:224b-36: dka' blo bde ba la ngo rtag pa de lta
T02D2683:224b-37: bu'i de sems kyi dri ma dang bral bar byas
T02D2683:224b-38: te / de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la
T02D2683:224b-39: de lta bu la ni ras sam dar dkar po
T02D2683:224b-40: la sogs pa'i gos gtsang ma bkon la dri zhim
T02D2683:224b-41: po'i me tog gi cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan
T02D2683:224b-43: phyi nang gi rgyan gyis lus sems mdzes par brgyan la /
T02D2683:224b-44: de'i 'og tu theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa'i yon tan bstan cing bskul ba gdab ste /
T02D2683:224b-46: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2683:224b-47: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
T02D2683:225a-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2683:225a-2: rang bzhin rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mdo'i don
T02D2683:225a-3: zab pa rgya che ba sangs rgyas nyid kyi spyod
T02D2683:225a-4: yul / mdo sde thams cad kyi snying po 'di theg pa chen po'i rigs can /

T02D2683:225a-6: gzhan la don nyams su len pa'i yon tan slob dpon gyis slob ma la bstan te /
T02D2683:225a-7: de ltar bstan nas de'i 'og tu nyan pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon ston te /
T02D2683:225a-9: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2683:225a-10: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2683:225a-12: mdo sde 'di mnyan cing nyams su blangs pa'i yon tan gyi gzi brjid kyis /
T02D2683:225a-13: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2683:225a-14: rnam par rtog pa dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag
T02D2683:225a-15: rnams la phan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:225a-17: mi bzad pa yin da rnams kyang //
T02D2683:225a-18: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2683:225a-20: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams la las dang nyon
T02D2683:225a-21: mongs po'i bag chags rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul bzhin
T02D2683:225a-22: du mi bzad pa'i nad kyi rang bzhin pas /
T02D2683:225a-23: de zhi bar bya ba gong du gsungs pa ltar bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:225a-24: de ltar gnod pa zhi nas de'i 'og tu bde ba thob pa'i thabs ston te /
T02D2683:225a-27: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2683:225a-29: sems can las kyi bag chags kyi mthus tshe zad
T02D2683:225a-30: cing 'chi ba la sogs pa la mdo'i don mnyan
T02D2683:225a-31: pas bsgom pa'i tshul ma nor bar byas na tshe
T02D2683:225a-32: dang bsod nams tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing
T02D2683:225a-33: / nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa thams cang las thar par 'gyur ba'i tha tshig ge //
T02D2683:225a-34: cho ga'i thabs dang phan yon bshad zin to /
T02D2683:225a-36: // / da ni bum pa'i cho ga'i rkyen bstan te /
T02D2683:225a-38: nor bu yungs kar d'ur ba dang //
T02D2683:225a-40: nor bu ni mu tig dang /
T02D2683:225a-44: rin po che dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:225a-45: yungs kar ni 'bru sna lnga'i gtso bo ste /
T02D2683:225a-46: de'i khongs su bsdu ba ni //
T02D2683:225a-47: nas gro til 'bras mon sran la sogs pa'o //
T02D2683:225a-48: d'ur ba ni kha rgyan gyi don te /
T02D2683:225a-49: de'i khongs su bsdu ba ni by'a gri seng gri
T02D2683:225b-0: tsandan la sogs pa dri zhim bo'i shing @225b tsandan
T02D2683:225b-1: la sogs pa yal ga dang bcas zhes pa'o //
T02D2683:225b-2: da ni rin po che lnga dang snying po ston te /
T02D2683:225b-3: rin chen rma med tsandan bcas //
T02D2683:225b-4: zhes pa ni rin po che ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2683:225b-7: shel dang ain dra ni la dang /
T02D2683:225b-8: byi ru zhes pa'i don no //
T02D2683:225b-9: rma med pa ni de rnams la skyon la sogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2683:225b-10: tsandan ni gla rtsi dang gur gum dang /
T02D2683:225b-12: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bye brag smos pa'i don to //
T02D2683:225b-13: shel dang rdo rje me tog dang //
T02D2683:225b-14: zhes pa ni shel dang rdo rje gnyis ni snying por shes pa'i don no //
T02D2683:225b-15: shel ni me shel dang chu shel gnyis kyi don no //
T02D2683:225b-16: da ni snying po phyi ma gsum gyi don ston to //
T02D2683:225b-18: shing gi snying po bu ram dang /
T02D2683:225b-19: me tog gi snying po sbrang rtsi zhes pa'i don no //
T02D2683:225b-20: me tog ni bum pa'i gdan gyi tha tshig go //
T02D2683:225b-21: dbyar ni me tog gi dkyil 'khor bya /
T02D2683:225b-22: dgun ni tshon sna lnga'i dkyil 'khor padma la sogs pa la bya ba'i don to //
T02D2683:225b-23: gzhan du bum pa'i kha rgyan te /
T02D2683:225b-24: me tog la sogs pa dag gis kha rgyan bya ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2683:225b-25: chu yi gser ram yang na ni //
T02D2683:225b-26: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2683:225b-27: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang //
T02D2683:225b-28: zhes pa ni bum pa'i rgyu ste /
T02D2683:225b-29: rgyal po ni gser gyi bum pa bya /
T02D2683:225b-30: blon po ni dngul gyi bum pa kyang ni tshig gi lhag ma can te /
T02D2683:225b-31: 'bangs phal pa ni zangs dang lcags la sogs pa'i bum pas bya ba'i don to //
T02D2683:225b-32: gzhan du na phrin las so so'i bye brag tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2683:225b-33: gtsang ma'i gos ni ras kha tshar ma nyams pa
T02D2683:225b-34: ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i tha tshig
T02D2683:225b-35: go // de'i 'og tu grangs ston te /
T02D2683:225b-37: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2683:225b-38: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2683:225b-39: rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas na ni //
T02D2683:225b-42: 'bangs kyi ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs te /
T02D2683:225b-44: blon po ni brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ste /
T02D2683:225b-46: rgyal po ni bsod nams che bas tha ma brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02D2683:225b-47: blon po tha ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02D2683:225b-49: de ni grangs kyi bsnyen pa'o //
T02D2683:225b-51: tshig dang don bzlog pa ni rang bzhin gyis shes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:226a-3: rgyal po rtag tu khrus kyis shig / ces gsungs te /

T02D2683:226a-5: rgyal po sna la smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2683:226a-6: bsod nams che bas byas pa sna la smos pa'i phyir ro//
T02D2683:226a-7: des thams cad bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2683:226a-8: 'bangs ni rgyal po'i 'khor bas don gyis shes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2683:226a-9: mdo yi don gyi dgongs pa la //
T02D2683:226a-11: 'phags pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02D2683:226a-12: 'di grub brtsams pas de grub shog / rdo rje
T02D2683:226a-13: rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad
